bio: OP original content creator and educator for thai community since June 2022.
contributionDescription: I have been contributing original content localized for the Thai community, drawing from official articles, core team publications, and various sources like EthGlobal and Bankless. I then distill this information into simpler graphics, utilizing my creativity stemming from my advertising background

contributionLinks.description: Original OP Article incl. artwork on mirror
Youtube VDO on Optimism and OP Stack
OP thread on twitter almost all in here
Experimental NFT art donating eth to RPGF address

impactDescription:
In 2022, The journey of the Thai community with Optimism began, initially revolving around NFTs and airdrops (including me). However, as I listened to the core team at events like EthGlobal, EthDenver, and various others, I started to understand how open-source initiatives can establish digital country and have a global impact.

Fueled by this, I began translating nearly every document into Thai and using my Photoshop skills to create eye-catching art that grabbed people's attention. This effort convert normal user into loyal followers who are still with me today. As a result, my Twitter account and content on other platforms have grown and become one of the most trusted sources for the Thai community.

impactMetrics.description: Donating ETH to RPGF address through NFT
